problem: 如图所示,点O是AC的中点,将周长为4cm的菱形ABCD沿对角线AC方向平移AO长度得到菱形OB′C′D′,则四边形OECF的周长是()
answer: 解:由平移的性质得,▱ABCD∽▱OECF,且AO=OC=\frac{1}{2}AC,故四边形OECF的周长是▱ABCD周长的一半,即为2cm．故选:B．
comment: 此题主要考查学生对菱形的性质及平移的性质的综合运用．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, point O is the midpoint of AC. Translate the diamond ABCD with the perimeter of N_0 along the diagonal AC by the length of AO to obtain the diamond OB′C′D′, then the perimeter of the quadrilateral OECF is ()
